question:
In context with the release of the 10th Pneumonia and Diarrhoea Progress report, consider the following statements:
  1. It is published by WHO.
  2. Zinc supplementation is one of the parameters assessed by the report.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Statement 1 is incorrect: The 10th edition of the Pneumonia and Diarrhoea Progress Report was released by the International Vaccine Access Centre. It released the report in context with the World Pneumonia day on November 12th. It reported that one out of every four deaths among children under 5 years is due to pneumonia and diarrhoea. Statement 2 is correct: Zinc supplementation is one of the parameters assessed by the IVAC in the report. India achieved 20% coverage in zinc supplementation. It is one of the 10 key interventions analysed by the report. Others include breast feeding, ORS, vaccination, etc.
